# Testing CI Workflow

This file was created to test the GitHub Actions CI workflow.

## Test Checklist

- [ ] Workflow triggers on push
- [ ] Workflow triggers on pull request
- [ ] Format check passes
- [ ] Clippy lint passes
- [ ] Build succeeds on all platforms (Linux, Windows, macOS)
- [ ] Tests pass on all platforms
- [ ] Security audit runs (may have warnings, that's OK)

## How to Verify

1. Check the **Actions** tab in GitHub
2. Look for the workflow run
3. Verify all jobs complete successfully
4. Check that status checks appear on the PR
